website_summaries.verdict: An effective, attractive machine, but it falls short of all the Funtime has to offer.
cons: Some testers note that the unit takes longer to heat up than similar models

customer_reviews.title: Fun machine and works faster than the cheap department store ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun machine and works faster than the cheap department store ones, but not professional level by any means. The cotton comes out the top and you have to work to learn how to spin it onto the cone correctly. It doesn't work nearly as well if it isn't cleaned every time. Also, the fuse holder on mine burned up after 2 uses. I replaced it myself rather than sending this monstrous package back.
customer_reviews.author: RideUtah

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and would give it a 5 star
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and would give it a 5 star, but I am unable to get the 2 of the screws out of the head so I can clean it. It seems as if they are over tightened and will not break lose with out stripping the screw. Not sure now how I will clean it. I use it as a rental item and lots of cotton candy was made in it over the weekend and now I'm afraid it will not work properly next time due to not being able to get the burnt stuff out of the head. :(
customer_reviews.author: Heather Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this machine for 2 yrs now and so far I’ve used it for 2 birthday parties, a fundraiser and several times at home. It’s been a hit with both children and adults.
customer_reviews.author: ACDC

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kids!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item does exactly what the description states. i brought the cheaper one at first and my kids were disappointed because it took forever to make just one cotton candy. i returned immediately! Children have no patience when it comes to sweets. i decided to spend the extra and buy this cotton candy machine. I looked at it as an investment because my children are young and will have sleepovers and birthday partys growing up. i even bring it to kids parties and the line stay busy but with a short wait time( kid friendly).
customer_reviews.author: Daphney

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My family & I LOVE this cotton candy maker!! It's quick to make cotton candy, looks so adorable, gets lota of attention, and makes yummy cotton candy!
customer_reviews.author: BKG

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 30 seconds
customer_reviews.text: Turn it on for the first time to let it warm up and it lasted about 30 seconds. Motor just quit spinning light still worked. Requested replacement we'll see how the second one goes.
customer_reviews.author: Brad L.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good depending on the conditions
customer_reviews.text: You have to order the plastic net that goes inside the machine if you want to make the cotton candy correctly. Without the net, it just flies everywhere. If you are in a windy area or plan on using this outside, look into a globe top. Otherwise, this performs great inside, with the net and without wind.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several of these for a business. Even with light use, these machines die within 6-12 month. While they work, they're great. If you have good ingredients, you can. make great floss. But at this point, I cross my fingers that they die within the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Jill H.

customer_reviews.title: This machine is junk
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box pluged machine in made 2 to see if it worked and it worked good cleaned machine went to use it next day at carnival after purchasing 30 lbs of floss sugar and 1500 comes started to use it and all it does is blows fuses. Had an electrician check it out and the motor had a direct short ( this machine is junk) Never again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this machine
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this machine. I have made lots of bags for parties and school functions. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tana Richards

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. I have made several cones of cotton candy and have had no issues. The directions for using the product is a little vague and there is not alot of info online about cleaning the area where the sugar goes. Other than that, i am very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Jana Giraud

customer_reviews.title: Love it but.....
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our schools home and school club events October 2018. We have used it for 3 events. We have cleaned the tub as per instructions. We now have rust spots on our tub. I do not understand how something like this happens after 3 uses. Otherwise it works great and we love it! I have to contact the mfg. to see what their recommendations are.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Elementary School

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing...... used it 10times so far and it worked Flawlessly...... just remember to clean it the right was the first time.... lol oops
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased on April 25th 2017, used for the 1st time May 7th. A hour into the party started, it started smoking and had a crazy smell. We had to turn it off. I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nickole Roberts

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this cotton candy machine for our daughters. ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cotton candy machine for our daughters. We were tired of buying the cheaper ones that didn't work well. My husband & daughters loves making cotton candy.
customer_reviews.author: HRW

customer_reviews.title: To see my grandkids 😃
customer_reviews.text: I love to see the grandkids smiling when I'm getting ready to make candy for them.
customer_reviews.author: LaVoy

customer_reviews.title: Works great first time all other tries come out burnt.. not a great product..
customer_reviews.text: Horrible machine for commercial use. First cone great all others comes out burnt and taste burnt.. not a good machine for business use.. would highly not recommend buying this product. I'm sending my machine back..
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bedwell

customer_reviews.title: quaility
customer_reviews.text: super easy to use, kept up great at a work event. Only wish it came with the dome lid. Cotton candy was on the wall after use.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase!!!, kids love the self made party cotton candy, it was easy to set up, its great quality, works really good. easy to clean up

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for electrical issues!
customer_reviews.text: Machine didn’t get hot, I brought it to a big party and it wouldn’t work! Kids were standing waiting , it was embarrassing. I’m returning to try Clevr Brand!

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it we have rented a machine several times before & I finally bought my own ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazzard

customer_reviews.title: Great product- Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son’s circus birthday party. Super easy to use! Super easy to clean! Now we use it all the time when kids are over!

customer_reviews.title: It looks really nice & professional for our shop❗
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I chose this catton candy machine, it is perfect for our sweet treat shop, & the kids all love it💖

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine!! Very easy to use, East clean up. I would recommend getting a dome for it. If not, you'll have cotton candy flying everywhere.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just received today but no complaints. Very easy to put together! Tried it out by making cotton candy for the family and they were impressed. We'll see how it runs for the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Seiter

customer_reviews.title: Performed beautifully! Way beyond my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is a very hard worker. We worked an event with this machine, it ran for 4 hours straight! Performed beautifully! Way beyond my expectations!

customer_reviews.title: I added a grounded plug to the wall like it asked to do and it still burns the ...
customer_reviews.text: I just open the box to use it and the cotton candy machine doesn't work its keeps tripping the breaker. I added a grounded plug to the wall like it asked to do and it still burns the fuse. Can you help me

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine!
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic! Only wish it had the cover as it does make a bit of a mess when you make it!

customer_reviews.title: Used this for a block party, and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a block party, and it was a huge hit! Tip: to clean, take the heating element off and soak in water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to end a hectic day at work!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a moral booster for co-workers and company events. Everyone turns into a kid when they see it start. Used it about 5 times now for 5-10 people each time. Not one problem have we experienced. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: The machine worked great for about 30 minutes and then died -- the ...
customer_reviews.text: The machine worked great for about 30 minutes and then died -- the motor burned out. Am in the process of returning. I'm hoping this is just a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Rama

customer_reviews.title: Piece of trash!
customer_reviews.text: Both the original and the replacement only worked once before the coil burned out. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great cotton candy, not so great cart.
customer_reviews.text: The good: This product does exactly what you want it to do. It can crank out an impressive amount of cotton candy very quickly. I have used the rented commercial machines several times a year for the last five or six years. This does as good a job. The bad: I bought the entire cart system and the first time I took the machine out (the my son's school) one of the wheels started to completely fall apart. All of the spokes are breaking off. So, now it sits in my living room because I am afraid to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Pelej

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY, IT BREAKS EASY.
customer_reviews.text: completely stopped working. have used six times and just stopped. amazon isn't helping me here wither. what a horrible crap product.

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this for my daughter's graduation party and we love it! It's easy to use and relatively quiet
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter's graduation party and we love it! It's easy to use and relatively quiet. I would however recommend purchasing the bubble shield because the floss flies out and makes a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product more that i was expecting and is super fast my son and his friends love it.

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: It is fairly big but it is worth every penny! Could be a whole night of fun or a side job money maker! I think its a great product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it one of my favorite toys to play with the kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this machine! If you keep it clean, it works great. I clean it about every other use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use and has been lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Working well so far. It's easy to use and has been lots of fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy with it and considering purchase of a different machine
customer_reviews.text: I must say when i got this machine i noticed dings on bowl and had a hard time putting it together because one of the holes was too big and screw would just plop down without tightening. Im positive this machine haf been used previously, definitively NOT NEW. This machine works if you are doing few cotton candies. 20 or more it starts burning sugar up. Not too happy with it and considering purchase of a different machine. My 1 month return window is up otherwise I would return it without question.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: great machine!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: this is a very good machine, it is the best buy I ever brought, it produces a lot of cotton candy with no problem. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: steven garrett

customer_reviews.title: Bummed out
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this! But after only 3 cones, the fuse blew. Literally exploded inside the machine. I hope that it was a fluke, but I'm not going to try to buy one again, I'll just rent one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairy floss
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a cotton candy mashine for five years- have rented many and this one is even better that some of the professional ones I have rented in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Scot Rice

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: On halloween I made over 1000 miniature cones with this in three hours. In the past I had rented a unit for $60 each time. This will pay for itself in 4 years. Plus I can loan it to schools for their fairs and such. Well made, sturdy and easy to clean. The only concern is build up on the heating element, but I just poked it with a cone and it blew away.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri L. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the machine was defective, tried fixing it but never get cleaned.
customer_reviews.text: The machine was well-packed but it was dirty. Grease marks are all over the place. Both of the side bars have extra holes for handles which should be only one should have those holes. The sugar scoop was rusty inside. The machine stops abruptly when stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Having problems with fuse and will not make cotton candy correctly only used once and having lots of problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hood
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this machine. ..i was wondering if i need the hood dome..and what size will fit this machine

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Received but is missing the bottom part that supports the legs of the cart, so it is uneven with the wheels. Cart is cute but frustrating to be missing pieces. Need the rubber bottoms for the legs and metal components
customer_reviews.author: hbreu

customer_reviews.title: This is a good cotton candy machine for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cotton candy machine for the price. I don't know if it should be called "commercial grade" or not because it doesn't make as quickly as most other commercial cotton candy machines that I have seen. This is likely a "get what you pay for" type of product. If you are wanting high volume in a hurry, this probably isn't your best option.
customer_reviews.author: texasgirl5

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We received the cotton candy machine in a timely manner. It was for our youths fall festival. Got it set up but wouldn't work. Got hot but motor never came on or should I say the fan. Big disappointment. Returned it but plan to order replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Shep

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties!
customer_reviews.text: Great cotton candy maker! My mom bought this for my daughters birthday, but I also secretly wanted one to practice making those pretty cotton candy flowers lol. It works great and warms up in about 5 mins, sometimes less. Worked out great for my daughters birthday party and easy to clean! It does come in a huge box and is a LOT bigger than I thought! Oh and it's not loud at all, not as much as those cheaper smaller ones. Comes with the unit, plastic cotton candy cones and a metal scoop!
customer_reviews.author: MaeEunLyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Definatley buy the cover to keep the cotton ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Definatley buy the cover to keep the cotton candy from flying all over the place; it is worth spending the extra money to order. Cotton candy tasted great and kids loved it! It isn't very noisy and it is easy to clean. I used to make cotton candy at a carnival stand as a teenager and that was a professional machine; the Great Northern machine worked just as well. I use it for parties and sleepovers and also have the Great Northern Popcorn machine and it is a great product as well!
customer_reviews.author: Katie W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, but be warned this thing is huge (hard to tell in the pic).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in shipping and rusty inside of sugar scoop
customer_reviews.text: The product itself it great, however it arrived with three dents in the cotton candy machine cart on the side.. and the sugar scoop has rust inside. Worked well though. Would request a new one but don’t have the extra time to return and put a new one together again so just accepting it.
customer_reviews.author: #1aunt

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Christmas gift I have ever purchased for my boys. Had a cheap one before and it took 15 minutes to heat up and make one cone. This baby heats up in about 5 minutes and then makes a huge cone on cotton candy in about 20 secs. Huge hit for my boys on movie nights and when they have friends over. easy to use and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: I love cotton candy
customer_reviews.text: This is an effective and affordable machine that makes wonderful cotton candy quickly. I use it as a pastor for Vacation Bible School, children's activities, and other church and community events.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great cotton candy machine!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great. It makes a lot of cotton candy in such a little time. Putting it together was like putting together a piece of IKEA furniture and was a little difficult, but the end result is literally a BEAST cotton candy machine!!! Also I recommend using "Gold Medal flosssugar" for this machine as it yields great results.
customer_reviews.author: Syed

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay...
customer_reviews.text: Floss head stopped working after a few months and the candy gets very built up on the head - have no idea how to clean the head and the instructions aren't helpful. Sadly, this isn't a highly-Googled topic, haha. Nonetheless, the company is nice enough to send me a new floss head - hopefully it works.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Goins

customer_reviews.title: We tried it out at a Cub Scout night and it ran for 3 hours and did wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wanting one of these for so long and this lived up to his dreams. We tried it out at a Cub Scout night and it ran for 3 hours and did wonderfully!

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my husband who has a love for cotton candy that is unexplainable but is extreme. We have a family love affair with this machine, works great warms up fast, I would recommend buying the plastic bubble thing that goes over it so you don't have strings of sugar floating everywhere. Worth the price and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for an end of school Fun Day Party at my daughters school
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an end of school Fun Day Party at my daughters school. It apparently overheated and melted the fuse inside the unit after using it for only about 15 minutes and after only about 15 cotton candy cones. Amazon shouldn't sell this product. The other reviews I read are surprisingly bad.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Unfortunately a more common occurance if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Unfortunately a more common occurance if you buy products on Amazon from third party vendors. Someone posted, and it's true, happened to me, you will break the wheel lug nuts. They are metal with plastic cover, so when you screw them on, as soon as you tighten them, they will break. I am a handy person, this is no exaggeration, you will be making a trip to home depot.
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine, kids love the cotton candy!
customer_reviews.text: This cotton candy maker still work well after 3 smaller events making about 20 cones each of 3 different flavors. Easy removing of the bowl for cleaning with warm water. Planning to bring this to a festival event, will see how it works after about 300 cones with 7 different flavors. Updates: after went through 300 cones at a new year festival, this machine is doing well for smaller gathering in my basement, no problem!

customer_reviews.title: Great cotton candy machine!
customer_reviews.text: Used this machine once so far to serve over 175 children/adults in an hour and it performed great.

customer_reviews.text: I like it but it don't hold enough cotton candy, you can't put nothing but a small amount in there. It want fill up one straw

It was not until after we turned it on we found that the units blade was tilted and the to close to the bowl making a low annoying noise. The inside wher the blade is was dented and the bowl itself had dents.

product_meta.title: 6315 Great Northern Popcorn Flufftastic Cotton Candy Machine Floss Maker With Cart
product_meta.description:
Size:With Cart

If you are in the market for a cotton candy machine with a cart, stop looking! This commercial quality Flufftastic Cotton Candy machine with Cart by the Great Northern Popcorn Company will make you a hit at your next party! It features an easy cleaning stainless steel kettle, and an industry leading 1000 Watt high performance heating element. With the antique style design, you will be reminiscing about your early days at the ball game, carnival, or the movie theater. We have combined the best of both worlds--not only are you getting today's technology, you get an eclectic design with all the conveniences of the modern era. 

Why buy a Flufftastic machine? 

 * Quiet Design! 
 * Premium Grade Steel - 30%thicker than our competition. 
 * Stylish Design - compare for yourself. 
 * Richer Color - Premium paint and enhanced colors. 
 * Great Northern Quality and 1 Year Warranty! 
 * Robust Design/Craftsmanship! 

 Features: 

 * Easy Use with front ON-OFF Switch. 
 * Built-in Fuse for safety. 
 * Warms up quickly. 
 * Power stabilization. Save electricity when making cotton candy. 
 * Much Safer! The Metal Bowl shields the electrical wires from hands. 
 * One long Sugar Scoop! Makes placing sugar into the kettle simple and without spillage! 
 * Works Continually and Yields one cotton candy cone per 30 Seconds. 
 * 13" Wheels make moving this machine around a breeze! 
 * Sturdy steel frame.
 * Two shelves to make your job easier. 
 * Chrome handle. 

What is Included: 

 * Instruction manual. 
 * 1 Stainless Steel Scoop. 
 * Easy to Clean, Stainless Steel Pan. 

Specifications: 

 * Power: 1000W, AC 110V (High efficiency). 
 * Large 20.5" Diameter Bowl size for more cotton candy making. 
 * Machine Dimension: 13" L x 13" W x 11.5" H (20.5" H with bowl). 
 * Dimensions with cart: 37" H x 36 W x 20.5" L.
feature_bullets: ►Easy to Clean, 21" diameter Stainless Steel Pan
►Stylish cart attaches for portability. Includes two (2) working shelves that hold three (3) cones each.
►Produces 2 Cotton Candy Cones per minute. The direct drive motor spins at 2000 RPMs.
►Simple to use: Turn on the motor and warm up for 2 minutes
►Includes 6 hard plastic cotton candy cones, sugar scoop and a 1 Year Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
